cleaned_text: Mindfulness Meditation & Crystal Bowl with Harumi Maejima April 6, 2024 Come and join us on a wonderful path of mindful meditation using crystal bowls. This group setting provides the perfect environment for guiding us from unawareness to conscious existence. The meditative state is frequently described as a state of clarity in being. Each of us is progressing to this heightened awareness to varying extents, yet attaining a state of tranquility and serenity is notably more achievable within a group context. The collective support inherent in group meditation also presents each individual with a chance to attain deeper understanding regarding specific challenges or matters they seek clarity on. If you're in search of insights, relaxation, and methods to infuse mindfulness into your life, this class is tailor-made for you. *Please note that this program grants guests access only to the program location. Please consider adding a [tour](https://franklloydwright.org/tickets-tours/) to your program to see more of our property. Time: 9:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m. Moon Gate Garden Price: Adults $25 Students (13-25 with student ID) $17 Members $22.50 Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation Members receive discounts on Cultural Programs, have access to special Member-Only programs, and more.
